ul.li: Copy - duplicates the files on a source at a target host.
Move - is equivalent to the Copy operation, except that the source files will be removed after the transfer has been completed successfully.
Remove - removes files from a source host.
GetList - does not transfer files: instead a list of files that are available for transfer is retrieved.
Copy - duplicates the files on a source at a target host.

Remove - removes files from a source host.
GetList - does not transfer files: instead a list of files that are available for transfer is retrieved.
